title: Maven Viper Torch Lighter
description: Introducing, Maven Viper, the first Maven table torch to feature a two toned chrome finish.Â  A tall table torch standing at 8 inches long, Viper's flame is strong enough to match the size. Don't worry about it falling over, the base of the torch is intentionally designed for it to stay put while standing. Viper's centerpiece is a mirror in the body of the torch, which comes with a cloth inside to keep it clean and presentable.  Features:  Single Windproof Jet Flame Adjustable Flame Safety Lock/ Ignition Hold Butane Refillable Material: Zinc Alloy, Metal Finish: Rubber/Metallic Weight: 10 ounces Size: 8 x 2 x 4 in Type: Hand Torch/Table Torch
